amendment.description: Amendment adjusts for inflation the annual cap of the individual investments in the securities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 112-265 to index the $10,000 individual investment cap to inflation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quayle amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Quayle.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Quayle amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
